```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(etude)
dir <- system.file("Examples", package = "etude")
exs <- dir %>%
  etude_dir() %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
    exercise = file,
    answers = FALSE, documentation = FALSE, name = "Problem 1: "
  ) %>%
  dplyr::filter(
    is.na(runtime)
  )
```


`r etude_list(exs)`
